channel.title: I'm considering making this account my main
channel.description:
29 Combat. [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/9tkhvo.png[/img]
I've only been a member once before, for 1 month. I used to be a def pure/pray skiller, then I got str to level my CB because i'm currently mining addy ore. and you need at least 29 cb for the scorpions to not auto-attack.
I'll remain f2p for a while, until I know I won't get bored of this account, then possibly back to p2p.
Suggestions? Concerns? Feedback?

item.title: I'm considering making this account my main
item.dc:creator: @SunSpec221 SunSpec221
item.description:
@SunSpec221 wrote:

You should train it like this

60 Attack
80 Strength
99 Defence

if you gonna be a def pure.

get the other skills incase u wanna change to a main(like 99 everything)

Read full topic
item.source: I'm considering making this account my main
